name: Flynn: Son of Crimson (Demo)
description:
Flynn: Son of Crimson is a 2D action adventure platformer with heavy metroidvania elements. Set in a wondrous world with a looming darkness beginning to awaken yet again.

Take on the role of Flynn, a young man orphaned as a child who sets out to chase the shadows of his beginnings whilst awakening the power of Crimson within him. 

Explore a wondrous world filled with discovery, taking place in unique regions designed with non-linear exploration. Reveal secret pathways, trade with villagers, battle fierce monsters, hang out with dogs.

From the very first stages of development, we began designing Flynn: Son of Crimson with fast paced, satisfying combat. We’re strong believers that ‘game feel’ should be priority in any video game so we've been injecting as much juice as we can to make sure every hit packs a punch and feels extra tasty.
